entry.title: Wholesale - Cork Bark Slabs By the Piece Without Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 0.80 - 11.50 (4 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
  • Wholesale Information
  • SHIPPING
  • Guarantee
    1. Quantity box indicates desired pieces of size indicated. Cork bark is a perfect medium for displaying air plants, orchids and bromeliads. You can create beautiful wall hangings by attaching a wire and mounting screw. Cork bark replicates one of the air plants' favorite natural hosts, the branches and trunks of tropical trees. Great for creating unique gifts to sell at farmer's markets, gift shops or craft shows. No air plants are included with the cork bark in this listing. For wholesale cork bark sets with air plants, shop here. For waterproof E-6000 glue, shop here.

entry.title: Wholesale - Natural Cholla Cactus Containers with Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 4.95 - 5.95 (2 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
  • Wholesale Information

    1. Cholla is a cactus found in the desert SW and Northern Mexico. After several years, old wood naturally dies and can be removed from the plants. After an intensive cleaning and removal of the thorns, we are left with a unique product that is great for displaying air plants. Assorted air plants are included for every cholla container purchased.

entry.title: Wholesale - Air Plant & Bromeliad Fertilizer Packet - One Year Supply
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type:
Price: 2.50

  • Description
  • Directions
  • Wholesale Information
    1. Wholesale Minimum Order of 12 Packets
    2. Formula: 17-8-22
    3. One Year Supply of Air Plant (Bromeliad) Fertilizer
    4. Specially formulated for air plants
    5. Encourage blooms and reproduction through pups
    6. Instruction card included with every packet
    7. May be added to spray bottles for easy application
    8. About 1 Year's worth of fertilizer for the average air plant/tillandsia enthusiast. This packet will make at least 12 gallons of fertilizer mixture. We recommend fertilizing your plants once per month.
  • DIRECTIONS: Add 1/4 teaspoon to a gallon of water and soak your air plants in the diluted mixture for 20 to 40 minutes once per month. The package comes with instructions and a one year supply of fertilizer. This is a very small package of fertilizer that will easily last for 12 months. It only takes 1/4 teaspoon of fertilizer per gallon of water. This package will make 12 gallons or 12 months
